Explore NASA+

NEW EPISODE AVAILABLE NOW

Join host Megan Cruz as she explores NASA’s Kennedy Space Center, where cutting-edge labs are designing rovers to dig up moon dirt for 3D-printed habitats, zapping moon dust off spacesuits with electricity, and testing growth methods for space farming.

[WATCH](https://plus.nasa.gov/video/far-out-science-you-can-eat/#fullscreen-player)

#### [Far Out: “Eat Peanuts, Get Paid”](https://plus.nasa.gov/video/far-out-eat-peanuts-get-paid/)

metadata.og:description: Far Out is a behind-the-scenes, immersive look at the incredible work happening all over the world in support of NASA’s missions.
